Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler Group, stated that the overall goal of the project is to evaluate and, hopefully, validate both fuel-efficiency gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, Sergio Marchionne said.`` It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles.
